text: Fast & Furious (also known by Fast & Furious 4) is a 2009 American action movie directed by Justin Lin. The story was written by Chris Morgan. The movie is the fourth one of the Fast and the Furious movies. The movie gets back together the actors Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster. The movie follows from The Fast and the Furious, the 2001 movie into a the time right now. The same actors are in both movies. The movie came out on April 3, 2009. The movie got bad comments when it came out. The movie made $363 million dollars all over the world. == Cast == * Vin Diesel as Dominic "Dom" Toretto * Paul Walker as Brian O'Conner * Michelle Rodriguez as Leticia "Letty" Ortiz * Jordana Brewster as Mia Toretto * John Ortíz as Arturo Braga / Ramón Campos * Laz Alonso as Fenix Rise * Sung Kang as Han Seoul-Oh * Gal Gadot as Gisele Yashar * Tego Calderón as Tego * Don Omar as Rico Santos * Jack Conley as Penning * Shea Wigham as Agent Michael Stasiak * Liza Lapira as Agent Sophie Thrin ==References== Category:2009 action movies Category:2009 thriller movies Category:2000s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Japanese action movies Category:Japanese thriller movies Category:Fast & Furious movies Category:Movies directed by Justin Lin Category:Movies set in the Dominican Republic
title: Fast & Furious (2009 movie)
